Review Text: I was at Solitude Hotel in January 2018 and the facilities were completely run down. Service was sloppy. The common areas were unkempt.   I came in for my usual big prawns but even the quality of cooking was poor. So were the waiters. They were not even engaging.

It was in early 2015 that I went to Lagos for business and I stayed in this hotel all the time. The rooms are clean but has that extremely strong room refreshner everywhere from room to corridor to lobby. The breakfast was plain and simple ... Nothing as buffet or such. The bar area has what is needed . From local information to drinks of most kinds.  Security is high and it's a budget friendly hotel.

Review Title: A Good and Lovely Budget Hotel
Review Text: We stayed in Solitude Hotel & Spa two different times in 2015(Feb and Dec) and it is a place we will go back to again and again. It is clean and the staff are quite welcoming and very helpful and efficient. The breakfast is ok and the ambience is good too. It is very well located and close to many business places, great restaurants and a large mall. It is a very good budget hotel.

Just back from Lourdes and as always had the pleasure of staying in the solitude hotel. I would highly recommend this hotel for either business or pleasure . The staff are friendly and efficient. The food is by far the best in this hotel than any other I have stayed in. They cater to all tastes and cultures and their restaurant is one of the few in Lourdes that has room for wheelchairs without disturbing other diners. We have stayed many times in this hotel and have never had a problem in it that could not be solved. The manager Francois and his reception staff are highly efficient and professional but also welcoming and friendly and always easy to deal with. The bar staff are great especially Christine and Jean the managers and Frederic and Jean Claude who are look after all

Their rooms are outstanding in terms of cleanliness. Their beds are well spread with sparkling brand new sheets. You cannot fault them. Everywhere is impeccably neat and fresh. The Hotel is well managed and maintained .
Room Tips: Rooms at the top most floor are larger and have good ambiance.
